Package suncertify.util

The utilities package is the place for general, GUI-unrelated utility classes that are basically project-independent and might be deployed unchanged in the context of many other projects.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RemoteObservable Remote interface for the Observable class.
RemoteObserver Remote interface for observers.
 

Class Summary
Observable Distributed version of the standard Java Observable class that uses the exact same API as the Java class.
 

Package suncertify.util Description

The utilities package is the place for general, GUI-unrelated utility classes that are basically project-independent and might be deployed unchanged in the context of many other projects. Currently, this package contains two interfaces (RemoteObservable, RemoteObserver) and one class Observable to model a distributed RMI-based version of the Java standard observer/observable framework.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Lars Kuettner
